verses.verse: Likewise <WG3668>, ye wives <WG1135>, be in subjection <WG5293> to your own <WG2398> husbands <WG435>; that <WG2443>, if any <WG1536> obey not <WG544> the word <WG3056>, they <WG2770> also <WG2532> may <WG2770> without <WG427> the word <WG3056> be won <WG2770> by <WG1223> the conversation <WG391> of the wives <WG1135>;
